WorkItem.Description:
This just started occuring.  When I open VB Snippet Editor either independently or from within VS 2008, the snippet folders no longer load.  When I click on the Search dropdown, this error is thrown:  System.Xml.XmlException: Root element is missing.
 
Help!  Any ideas?  The details of the error follow.
 
Thanks ...
_______________________________
 
See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.

************** JIT Debugging **************
To enable just-in-time (JIT) debugging, the .config file for this
application or computer (machine.config) must have the
jitDebugging value set in the system.windows.forms section.

For example:
 
<configuration>

Comments.Message:
Win 7 Pro.  Same exact problem.  Any fix?

Thx.

Problem is likely your registry entries aren't found for your product version.  Download the source code and put a break in the LoadLanguagesFromRegistry method to see what languages are found (if any)
